item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0191; 04:40AM; 8900 S Sepulveda Westway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2ffVQ; Westchester; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters battled for just over 90 minutes to extinguish the blaze in the large commercial strip mall. Partial roof collapse and division walls created challenges in reaching the different areas of the fire inaccessible from the exterior, defensive mode. Firefighters were able to work some sections in the offensive mode while other portions remained defensive. There are still some hot spots remaining which crews will continue to address well into the morning. The large number of fire apparatus will impact traffic in the area and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM20 CM22 E205 E227 E263 E266 E292 E294 E295 E43 E51 E62 E63 E67 E85 EA1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA5 RA62 RA63 T27 T5 T63 T66 T92 T94 T95 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0191; 03:58AM; 8900 S Sepulveda Westway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2ffVQ; Westchester; The one story modern commercial building (strip mall) has division walls which render portions of the building safe to conduct an offensive operation. There is a partial roof collapse in the main fire section. Firefighters have extinguished the bulk of the fire and continue to battle against fire remaining in the rear portion (Charlie side) of the building. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM20 CM22 E205 E227 E263 E266 E292 E294 E295 E43 E51 E62 E63 E67 E85 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA5 RA62 RA63 T27 T5 T63 T66 T92 T94 T95 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0191; 03:40AM; 8900 S Sepulveda Westway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2ffVQ; Westchester; Firefighters are making progress against the blaze in the defensive mode with heavy streams. This fire is at the Greater Alarm status. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM20 CM22 E205 E227 E263 E266 E292 E294 E295 E43 E51 E62 E63 E67 E85 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA5 RA62 RA63 T27 T5 T63 T66 T92 T94 T95 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0191; 03:08AM; 8900 S Sepulveda Westway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2ffVQ; Westchester; One story commercial building (strip mall) with heavy fire from at least one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources requested.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E294 E295 E51 E63 E67 EM9 RA5 RA63 T5 T63 T94 T95; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1774; 11:21PM; 350 S Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vg7NyO; Mid-Wilshire; 13 story residential high rise building with nothing showing upon arrival. Firefighters began the investigation and located smoke showing on the 7th floor. Fire attack utilized the building stand pipes for water and extinguished a ‘contents only’ fire in the kitchen of one unit. A primary search located two dogs who were safely contained in a room. There were no other occupants. There was no evacuation required - all other residents sheltered in place in their units. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:54PM. ; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E211 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E294 E41 E52 E58 E61 E68 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA68 RA827 T11 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Possible Drowning; INC#1168; 05:35PM; 2032 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gz4HKm; Westlake; LAPD divers are in the water conducting a search. This will now be an LAPD operation only. All LAFD resources are being released. Any questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2662; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 RA13 RA811 T11; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Possible Drowning; INC#1168; 04:35PM; 2032 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gz4HKm; Westlake; LAFD ambulance was in the area of MacArthur Park and received reports from bystander stating they saw someone enter the lake and not come out. Based on the report, LAFD dispatched a *Drowning* response at 3:51PM and is initiating a search operation. LAPD Divers were requested. This will likely be an extended duration operation. LAPD Inc# 2662 No further details at this time.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E211 EM11 RA13 RA811 T11; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0632; 10:57AM; 400 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HToMP0; Downtown; Firefighters established an anchor point using a rope system (as a safety) and then proceeded to retrieve the workers via the window nearest their lift. They are now safely in the building and are not injured. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E10 E203 E210 E227 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA889 RA9 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue ; INC#0632; 10:19AM; 400 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HToMP0; Downtown; Two workers (no reported injuries) are stuck on a window-washing lift (the rig motor broke) at the 25th floor of the high rise building. Search and Rescue firefighters are consulting with the command staff and building engineer to ensure the workers are safely tethered and determine the course of action to enact a rescue. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E10 E203 E210 E227 E9 EM1 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA889 RA9 T10 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Blueline Train vs Vehicle 12/22/2022 INC#1056

item.description: Update Blueline Train vs Vehicle; INC#1056; 04:12PM; 1688 E Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qnW0tg; Central-Alameda; Firefighters extricated and are transporting one adult female patient in unknown condition. There is one patient additional patient (a pedestrian with an injury secondary to the collision - was not struck by the train) with a minor injury being transported. Track 1 and 2 are shut down and riders are advised to follow @metrolaalerts for updates. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to the appropriate law enforcement agency LAPD Inc# 2752. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E215 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA21 RA815 SQ21 T15; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart
